item.title: Sam Altman admits OpenAI was ‘on the wrong side of history’ in open source debate
item.description: Sam Altman, CEO of OpenAI, admits the company was "on the wrong side of history" in the open source AI debate during a Reddit AMA, signaling a potenti...

item.title: Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang meets with Donald Trump on AI
item.description: Nvidia confirmed that its CEO Jensen Huang met with U.S. President Donald Trump to discuss U.S. technology and AI leadership.

item.title: Beyond benchmarks: How DeepSeek-R1 and o1 perform on real-world tasks
item.description: o1 is slightly better at reasoning, but DeepSeek-R1 provides much more details about its reasoning, which is very useful to the user.

item.title: It’s here: OpenAI’s o3-mini advanced reasoning model arrives to counter DeepSeek’s rise
item.description: It's 63% cheaper than OpenAI o1-mini and 93% cheaper than the full o1 model, priced at $1.10/$4.40 per million tokens in/out.

item.title: Survive until 25? We’re off to a rough start | The DeanBeat
item.description: Last year, the saying going around the game industry was Survive until 25. The hope was that things would get better after a very rough year.
